description: Fols. 35; 20 x 14.5 cm.; written surface 16.5 x 10.7 cm.; 16-20 lines to page; on glazed European paper; in naskhi; with vowel signs; with catchwords; entries in red; with rubrications. A treatise on the majesty of God as revealed in the wonders of creation, in heaven and on earth, based upon traditions. Beg.: بسم الله ... الحمد لله المنفرد بالقدم والبقاء والعظمة Colophon: انتهى والحمد لله وحده وصلى الله على سىدنا محمد واله وصحبه وسلم A few marginal notes. The edges were trimmed. MS in different hands; in good condition; mended; Arabic binding with flap. Probably from XVIIIth century. Acquired from Brill, Leyden, A.D. 1900.
author: Nājī, Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad, 1407 or 8-1494 or 5.
title: Kitāb al-ʻAẓamah
creator: Nājī, Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad, 1407 or 8-1494 or 5.
subject: Islamic cosmology—Early works to 1800
